name: yur-framework
description: Interactive fullstack application for exploring the Infinite-Dimensional Thing Framework

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:analyze: cd frontend && ANALYZE=true npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lighthouse: npm run dev & sleep 10 && npx lighthouse http://localhost:5173 --output html --output-path ./benchmark-results/lighthouse.html && pkill -f 'npm run dev'

author: Carnell Lee
